1110111001001110 0001111111011000 1 -> sum: 0000111000100111, cout: 1

0001100000110001 0110110111100010 0 -> sum: 1000011000010011, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
